issue.title: [JS] Fix issues that blocked the v4.0.0 release
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12570](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12570). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A few issues had to be fixed manually for the v4.0.0 release:

- ts-jest throwing a type error running the tests on the TS source
- lerna.json really does need those version numbers
- npm has introduced rate limits since v3.0.0
- support npm 2FA one-time-passwords for publish
